name: Josh Pit
description:
A jam submission for Ludum Dare 48's theme Deep and Deeper!

Objective: Reach the bottom and squeeze through the hole safely! Switch modes to interact differently with the world.

Left/Right - Moves left.right

Z - Lets you pick up bonus beer kegs

X - Smashes incoming buzzkillers from below

C - Reduce falling speed greatly

Spacebar - Increases falling speed and allows you to squeeze through the finishing hole

Scoring:

1min : 5000

2min : 4500

3min : 4000

7min : 2500

15min : 2000

> 15min : 1000

Bonus Time : +1000

Buzzkillers : +250

Deaths: -50

Important Notes:

Spacebar Pose kills any dead bodies. This helps to clear the clog at the end.
